name: Lost Memories (itch) (Nightoutgale)
description:
Description

People switched to cloud consciousness, which helped them process information faster, but at the same time they began to forget some things, for example, where they left the book they read in the morning. Most people experience only a slight amnesia, forgetting only minor episodes, but some can not get out of the information web and decide to stay in the clouds for the whole of their allotted life.

You - are a detective, who helps people find things lost in their minds. Your life is mired in a work routine. But one evening someone came to you who will change your whole fate...
